reviews.text: LRT station with connections! Conveniently located in the neighbourhood hartland next to Seletar Mall and few stops from Sengkang  MRT station and bus interchanges with plenty of dinning shopping banking library postage community centre cinemas supermarkets  entertainment and amenities nearby. Friendly cosy comfy welcoming ambience for romantic intimates groups students tourists expats locals visitors and families.

This station is a little different compared to the other LRT stations due to it splits lines for the clockwise route and anti clockwise route. You got to take which direction you are heading. If you tolls the wrong direction, not to worry as it will return you to the other side of the track once it goes a big round.

Nice and quiet estate with Sengkang Park, Swimming Pool at one end, Seletar Mall, hawker center and 3 different food courts around.
A few more steps land you at Jalan Kayu. But I heard one of the best prata is at Kupang Lrt, at 473 Coffee Shop. (Yes better than Jalan Kayu.)
Do note, coffeeshop closes by 9pm+

Never show the timing properly of the train coming. And the 2 tracks is not on the same platform. I have to pray hard tht I chose the correct side to take the train... miss 1 train n u have to wait as you can't go across to the other side like other stations.
Blk 440D, loud speaker and crazy dance instructor from 8pm to 9pm every Thursday. Nice job Town Council
